text: Endothelial cells ( EC ) act as APC for resting PBL in vitro , and may have important roles in vivo in the pathogenesis of allograft rejection and delayed hypersensitivity .

We previously reported that human umbilical vein EC provide costimulatory signals to <extra_id_0> PHA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - stimulated PBL via <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : <extra_id_0> lymphocyte function-associated Ag-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and an unidentified ligand pair , resulting in a three - to eight-fold enhancement of <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> production .
